channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ME
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ME

item.title: Report X-2024021579
item.description:
Report X-2024021579

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-26T15:11:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-07
  • City: ROCKLAND
  • State: ME
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PACKAGE BROKE OPEN. THERE WERE NO MARKINGS OR LABELS ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE SHIPMENT. PACKAGE CONTAINED 12 16 OZ. PETROLEUM GASES, LIQUEFIED TANKS MARKED "DANGER, EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE." HMSC WAS NOTIFIED.
